description: OpenMW is the definitive way to play Morrowind, which is possibly the greatest WRPG of all time. The open source nature and the totaly recreation of the original engine is a feat, and it adds tons of functionality, stability, and quality of life features to a 20 year old game that were greatly needed.
Morrowind is a great game but a lot of issues arise with the original Bethesda engine. OpenMW is a fantastic recreation of Morrowind and it feels great to play.
what is this for really becouse game has a launcher already.

If you want to play Morrowind nowadays or even natively on Linux, OpenMW is the way to go ! all you need is the original game assets and files, also you might want to have a look at OpenMW-CS (which stands for construction set, to create mods and more) and TES3MP (Morowind Multiplayer which works online with dedicated servers)
summary: If only I knew this before !

description: Been using OpenMW for years, love this project. Everyone should download this!
OpenMW does an excellent job of providing tools to eliminate bugs from the base game and drastically enhance the graphics. OpenMW also supports Mods to further improve user experience.
summary: A great utility for a great game

description: Это лучшее, что можно было сделать для линукс, все работает, необходимы будут исходники оригинала игры
